title: Clear night city driving with lots of traffic and pedestrians.
caption: A white bus drives down a busy city street at night with lots of traffic and pedestrians.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 1.3 m/s). There are 21 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The video shows a white bus driving down a busy city street at night. There are many other vehicles on the road, including cars and trucks. The street is well-lit with streetlights and neon signs. The weather is clear and the visibility is good. There are several traffic lights and crosswalks along the street. The video also shows a few pedestrians walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
reasoning: The ego vehicle, a white bus, is driving down a busy city street at night. It is moving slowly and carefully navigating through the traffic. The bus is following the traffic rules and stopping at red lights. It is also keeping a safe distance from other vehicles on the road. The bus is equipped with sensors and cameras that help it detect and avoid potential hazards. The bus is also programmed to yield to pedestrians and give them the right of way. Overall, the bus is driving safely and responsibly on the busy city street at night.
